label: 蔭位
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: the ritsuryō system of accelerated promotion (shadow ranks") for sons and grandsons of princes and high officials. At the age of 21, sons and grandsons of princes and officials of the third rank or higher, and sons of those of the fourth and fifth ranks, were permitted to enter the bureaucracy at a rank higher than that of Initiate. First appointments depended on the ranks of their fathers or grandfathers.　[律令]"
